Plot: A loving trip back to the 1964-65 New York World's fair, followed by a fun look at how the fair is still with us today in pop culture, technology, and cultural understanding. influenced by it today.
Title: After the Fair: The Legacy of the 1964-65 New York World's Fair
Actors: Trey Callaway, Bill Cotter, Roland F. Crump, Jon Favreau
